text: When building cloud analytics solutions,

data leaders need a fast, easy, secure, 
reliable and low-cost data warehouse.

That’s why tens of thousands of 
customers use Amazon Redshift daily
for timely and actionable business insights.

With a fully managed, massively 
parallel processing (MPP) architecture,

Amazon Redshift delivers better price-performance 
than other cloud data warehouses.
Go from data to insights in seconds

without managing data warehouse infrastructure 
with Amazon Redshift Serverless.

And new AI-driven scaling and optimizations make 
Redshift Serverless more intelligent than ever.

Take the guesswork out of right 
sizing your data warehouse

as Redshift Serverless 
continuously learns and acts

on changes related to data and user 
volumes, query complexity, ETL patterns,

and more in your analytics workloads to 
meet desired price performance targets.

Easily integrate data across your 
databases, warehouses, and data lakes

including open table formats such as 
Apache Iceberg, streaming services,

and even 3rd party data with 
AWS’s zero-ETL approach,

that makes data available from 
data sources at the point of use.

And with all your data integrated and available, 
see how Amazon Redshift empowers every user

to run near real-time analytics 
and AI/ML applications
based on both SQL or open source frameworks.

Use Generative SQL to accelerate productivity 
and write SQL queries faster and with accuracy.

Do more with your data by sharing data 
and collaborating easily across teams,
customers, regions, and partners.

No data copying required and you 
benefit from industry leading
security and compliance, at no additional cost.
Get started with scalable, secure,

and high-performance analytics 
today with Amazon Redshift.
